entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:46 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 12:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -16.2°C
Wind: WSW 55 km/h gust 74 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100 becoming west 40 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie early in the evening. Blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
